item.title: 梅洛尼赢得穆迪将意大利评级从 "垃圾 "边缘提升的希望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）认为意大利的信用评级有可能上调，该公司刚刚与其他竞争对手一道，对意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）推动财政紧缩的做法给予了奖励。【原文：Italy’s credit score is skewed toward a potential upgrade at Moody’s Ratings, which has just joined rivals in rewarding Premier Giorgia Meloni’s push for fiscal restraint.】

item.title: 伊朗谈判陷入僵局，对冲基金更看好布伦特原油
item.description: 对冲基金对布伦特原油的看涨仓位达到了 4 月初以来的最高水平，原因是美国与伊朗迅速达成核协议的前景暗淡，令市场预期欧佩克成员国的原油流动可能会受到限制。【原文：Hedge funds boosted their bullish position on Brent crude by the most since early April as fading prospects for a quick US-Iran nuclear deal raised expectations that the OPEC member’s flows may be curtailed.】

item.title: 华尔街守旧派的糟糕一周，加密货币让仇敌火冒三丈
item.description: 对华尔街的许多人来说，这仍然是异端邪说。一种诞生于反建制神话、被欺诈和不良行为者玷污的资产，不仅能够生存，而且还能茁壮成长。别管无休止的欺诈、交易所黑客等等。【原文：To many on Wall Street, it’s still heresy. An asset born from anti-establishment myth, tainted by fraud and bad actors, not only survives — it thrives. Never mind the endless grift, exchange hacks, and more.】

item.title: 巴拉圭将关键利率维持在 6%，通胀预期保持稳定
item.description: 巴拉圭中央银行将基准利率稳定在 6%，理由是长期通胀预期稳定，符合其目标。【原文：Paraguay’s central bank kept its benchmark interest rate steady at 6%, citing stable long-term inflation expectations congruent with its target.】

item.title: 特朗普在国家安全审查后支持美国钢铁与日本合作
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统支持美国钢铁公司与日本新日本制铁公司之间的合作，称他的关税政策促成了一项投资，使这家美国标志性企业得以留在美国。【原文：President Donald Trump backed a partnership between United States Steel Corp. and Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp., crediting his tariff policies for an investment that would keep the iconic American firm in the US.】

item.title: Salesforce 重启收购 Informatica 的谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，Salesforce 公司正在洽谈收购软件公司 Informatica Inc.【原文：Salesforce Inc. is in talks to acquire software company Informatica Inc., rebooting a pursuit that fell through last year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 智利财政部长希望释放数十亿美元新投资
item.description: 智利财政部长马里奥-马塞尔（Mario Marcel）表示，继多年来人们抱怨繁文缛节过多之后，智利政府正在准备立法，通过加快审批程序来释放数十亿美元的投资。【原文：Chile’s government is readying legislation to unlock billions of dollars of investments by speeding up the approval process, following years of complaints over excessive red tape, Finance Minister Mario Marcel said.】

item.title: 儿童零售商 Claire's 因关税担忧而聘请顾问
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，由于关税问题升级给零售商的盈利带来压力，Claire's Stores 公司正在咨询华利安公司（Houlihan Lokey Inc.【原文：Claire’s Stores Inc. is consulting Houlihan Lokey Inc. on how to shore up its finances as escalating tariff concerns pressure the retailer’s earnings, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: CommScope 正考虑出售宽带部门 CCS
item.description: 据知情人士透露，CommScope 控股公司正在探索出售其宽带连接和电缆部门，因为这家网络基础设施公司正在出售资产以偿还债务。【原文：CommScope Holding Co. is exploring a sale of its broadband connectivity and cable arm, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as the network infrastructure firm unloads assets to repay debt.】

item.title: 巴西里奥阿托公司与债务重组顾问合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西可再生能源公司 Rio Alto Energias Renovaveis SA 正在与金融咨询公司 Laplace Finanças 和律师事务所 Felsberg Advogados 合作，担任债务重组顾问。【原文：Brazilian renewable energy company Rio Alto Energias Renovaveis SA is working with financial advisory firm Laplace Finanças and law firm Felsberg Advogados as debt restructuring advisers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在美国寻求监管稳定币的同时，Tether 将目光投向别处
item.description: 虽然美国国会正在审议有助于将稳定币更多地融入主流金融的法案，但最大的数字代币发行商表示，它将继续专注于服务美国以外的市场。【原文：While Congress is considering bills that would help integrate stablecoins more into mainstream finance, the largest issuer of the digital tokens says it will continue to focus on serving markets besides the US.】

item.title: 特朗普称苹果关税还将针对三星和其他制造商
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他周五早些时候威胁对苹果公司征收的关税也将针对包括三星电子公司在内的设备制造商，以刺激它们将产品生产转移到美国。【原文：President Donald Trump said that the tariffs he threatened against Apple Inc. earlier Friday would also be aimed at device makers including Samsung Electronics Co. to spur them into moving manufacturing of their products to the US.】

item.title: 贝森特称特朗普暂停主权财富基金关注债务问题
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，特朗普政府暂停了创建主权财富基金的计划，因为总统优先考虑偿还国债。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Trump administration paused plans to create a sovereign wealth fund as the president prioritizes paying down the national debt.】

item.title: 交易员因政策风险抛弃美国，新兴股市和外汇市场上涨
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普再次发出关税威胁，投资者纷纷撤离美国资产，新兴市场货币和股市周五走高。【原文：Emerging-market currencies and stocks advanced on Friday, as President Donald Trump’s renewed tariff threats sent investors rushing out of US assets.】

item.title: Cenovus 首席执行官在推动有机增长的同时淡化收购 MEG 的可能性

item.title: 保加利亚如何逐步加入欧元区
item.description: 保加利亚有望获得欧盟批准，在 2026 年 1 月采用欧元。这个欧盟最贫穷的成员国多年来一直在为加入单一货币打基础，历届政府都声称这将有助于缩小与欧盟其他国家的贫富差距。【原文：Bulgaria looks to be on track to win the European Union’s approval to adopt the euro in January 2026. The bloc’s poorest member has being laying the groundwork for years to join the single currency, with successive governments claiming this will help close the wealth gap with other EU states.】

item.title: 巴塞罗那足球俱乐部寻求债务修正案，以争取时间完工球场
item.description: 知情人士透露，巴塞罗那足球俱乐部（FC Barcelona）正在寻求修改其债务条款，以便有更多的时间完成诺坎普球场（Spotify Camp Nou）的改造工程。【原文：FC Barcelona is seeking to amend the terms of its debt to allow more time to finish the revamp of its Spotify Camp Nou stadium, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 穆迪下调美国评级后，纯净的应税债券有望获得收益
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，由于穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）下调了美国政府的评级，投资者将到其他地方寻找优质信用，因此高质量的应税市政债券有望获得提振。【原文：High-quality taxable municipal bonds are poised to get a boost as the downgrade of the US government by Moody’s Ratings will leave investors looking elsewhere for pristine credits, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 加纳保持利率稳定，塞地反弹将抑制通胀

item.title: 欧元区主要经济体现在的通胀率可能在 2% 或以下

item.title: 受特朗普新关税威胁影响，美元 2025 年跌幅达 7
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对欧盟征收新的高额关税，再次引发了投资者对全球贸易政策的担忧，美元汇率周五下滑，将今年以来的跌幅扩大到 7% 以上。【原文：The dollar slid Friday, extending this year’s losses to over 7%, after President Donald Trump threatened steep new tariffs of the European Union and revived investor concerns over global trade policy.】
